description: The directed relationship between two resources in a resource relationship network shall be defined as a resource network connection.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: definedBy
contents.description: The resource network connection type defining this resource network connection.

contents.name: connectsTo
contents.description: The to resource reference to which this resource network connection connects

contents.name: connectsFrom
contents.description: The from resource reference to which this resource network connection connects

contents.name: hasPropertiesOf
contents.description: The resource network connection property(s) related to this resource network connection.
